en.question: Hello there stranger! My name is Zeus and I'm here to assist you with your Québec tenant/landlord issues. I'll be going into beta soon, and would like to get more context about common problems. If you don't mind telling me about any tenant/landlord issues you have, we'll try to get back to you as soon as possible with some useful information.
Would you like to ask me a question about tenant/landlord issue?
Mind leaving your email so that we can let you know once our beta is live?
Would you like to receive updates on our beta test?
Thank you so much! I'll be in touch. Have a nice day!

fr.question: Hello there stranger! My name is Zeus and I'm here to assist you with your Québec tenant/landlord issues. I'll be going into beta soon, and would like to get more context about common problems. If you don't mind telling me about any tenant/landlord issues you have, we'll try to get back to you as soon as possible with some useful information.
Voulez-vous me poser une question concernant un problème de locataire/propriétaire?
Voulez-vous me laisser votre courriel pour que nous vous communiquons quand notre bêta commence?
Souhaitez-vous recevoir des mises à jour à propos de notre test bêta?
Merci beaucoup! Je serai en contact. Bonne journée!
